messages.subject: Bored No More Article on Sandra Dodd's Website
messages.msgSnippet: http://sandradodd.com/BoredNoMore Just been reading this informative article by Sandra and found it helpful. My two girls often come and say they are bored. It
messages.messageBody:
http://sandradodd.com/BoredNoMore

Just been reading this informative article by Sandra and found it
helpful. My two girls often come and say they are bored. It usually
results in them sitting on my lap for a one on one chat about
something then by us tickling each other relentlessly and having fun
laughing together. Then after a while they usually skip off saying
they had remembered about something they wanted to do earlier and
off they go to another part of the house.

I sometimes worry about my children in that I may not be providing
them with enough of myself if my energy tanks are low and I am
exhausted some evenings.

Thanks Sandra, your article made me not feel like I am doing anything
negative and strengthened my belief in what I am doing.

Helen J.
